version_description:
• Improve control.
• Starter skill for new character.
• Improve experience.
• Fix some issues.

• [New] 3 new master skills for each character.
• [New] Hunting quest.
• [New] Effect when you got new skill.
• [New] Guide in skill dialog.
• [New] Aden zone.
• [New] Monsters.
• [Improve] Game experience.

• [New] Auto pickup Jewels and Runes (on/off).
• [New] Show item label (on/off).
• [New] Effect for dropped items.
• [Improve] Auto hunting feature for wide range skill.

• [New] Wing 2.
• [New] Wizard's secondary weapon.
• [New] Magic Knight shield.
• [New] Super Large Healing and Mana potion.
• [Fix] Minor issues.

• [New] Pet item.
• [New] Reset character system.
• [New] Ranking - Leaderboard - Competition.
• [Fix] Can not upgrade items in inventory.
• [Fix] minor issues.

• [Improve] Super Item drop rate.
• [Fix] minor issues.

• [New] Manual/Auto sell items when full inventory, rearrange the inventory.
• [New] Passive Skill for all classes: completed Worthy Hero quest to unlock.
• [New] Soul Point: reset character to earn Soul Point.
• [New] Knight can wear 2 swords.
• [New] Archer can shoot in 2 sides.
• [New] Excellent damage (Purple).
• [New] Critical damage (Cyan).
• [New] Boss - Dark Mona - a wanderer boss.
• [New] Jewel of Infinity - enhance the weapon.
• [Fix] Agile bug.

• [New] Summoner class: new skill set, new items, new wing
• [New] Maximum warehouse coin up to 192 billion.
• [New] Instant Healing Potion.
• [New] Increase max Wizard's passive skill.
• [New] Auto find target: on/off.
• [Change] Remove Land of Grim safe zone.
• [Fix] Minor issues.

• [New] Exchange Lunar New Year item event.
• [Fix] Minor issues.
